messages: The Solemnity 'Annunciation of the Lord' falls on Holy Thursday in the year 2027, the celebration has been transferred to the Monday following the Second Sunday of Easter (April 5th) as per the Decree of the Dicastery for Divine Worship and the Discipline of the Sacraments.
'20th Sunday of Ordinary Time' is superseded by the SOLEMNITY 'The Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary' in the year 2027.
'9th Sunday of Ordinary Time' is superseded by the celebration with precedence over solemnities 'Corpus Christi' in the year 2027.

The FEAST 'Saint Mark the Evangelist', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on April 25th, is suppressed by the celebration with precedence over solemnities 'Fifth Sunday of Easter' in the year 2027.

The FEAST 'Saint James, Apostle', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on July 25th, is suppressed by the Sunday '17th Sunday of Ordinary Time' in the year 2027.

The FEAST 'Saint Stephen, The First Martyr', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on December 26th, is suppressed by the Sunday 'Holy Family of Jesus, Mary and Joseph' in the year 2027.

The Memorial 'Saint Anthony, Abbot', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on January 17th, is suppressed by the Sunday '2nd Sunday of Ordinary Time' in the year 2027.

The Memorial 'Saint Francis de Sales, Bishop and Doctor of the Church', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on January 24th, is suppressed by the Sunday '3rd Sunday of Ordinary Time' in the year 2027.

The Memorial 'Saint John Bosco, Priest', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on January 31st, is suppressed by the Sunday '4th Sunday of Ordinary Time' in the year 2027.

The Memorial 'Saint Scholastica, Virgin', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on February 10th, is suppressed by the celebration with precedence over solemnities 'Ash Wednesday' in the year 2027.

The Memorial 'Saints Cyril, Monk, and Methodius, Bishop', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on February 14th, is suppressed by the celebration with precedence over solemnities 'First Sunday of Lent' in the year 2027.

The Memorial 'Saint Polycarp, Bishop and Martyr' either falls between 17 Dec. and 24 Dec., or during the Octave of Christmas, or on the weekdays of the Lenten season in the year 2027, rank reduced to Commemoration.

The Memorial 'Saints Perpetua and Felicity, Martyrs', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on March 7th, is suppressed by the celebration with precedence over solemnities 'Fourth Sunday of Lent' in the year 2027.

The Memorial 'Saint Stanislaus, Bishop and Martyr', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on April 11th, is suppressed by the celebration with precedence over solemnities 'Third Sunday of Easter' in the year 2027.

The Memorial 'Saint Athanasius, Bishop and Doctor of the Church', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on May 2nd, is suppressed by the celebration with precedence over solemnities 'Sixth Sunday of Easter' in the year 2027.

The Memorial 'The Immaculate Heart of the Blessed Virgin Mary' coincides with another Memorial 'Saint Boniface, Bishop and Martyr' in the year 2027. They are both reduced in rank to optional memorials (Decree of the Dicastery for Divine Worship and the Discipline of the Sacraments).

The Memorial 'Saint Anthony of Padua, Priest and Doctor of the Church', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on June 13th, is suppressed by the Sunday '11th Sunday of Ordinary Time' in the year 2027.

The Memorial 'Saint Benedict, Abbot', added in the Editio Typica 1970 of the Roman Missal since the year 1970 (Apostolic Constitution Missale Romanum) and usually celebrated on July 11th, is suppressed by the Sunday '15th Sunday of Ordinary Time' in the year 2027.
